How to hone your profile

The communications industry is always on the move. Not only the digital media change the job profiles. Also, the requirements and jobs in agencies and companies are constantly changing. Here you will find the most important job descriptions

Job descriptions: choose your position

  • Budget Director
  • Graphic artist
  • Innovation Manager
  • Interface Designer
  • Communications Designer
  • Konzepter
  • Customer Advisor Marketing
  • Media Planners

  • Motion Designer
  • Package Designer
  • Product Designer
